Weather: More chilly mornings to come after Auckland’s coldest weekend of the year https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/weather-more-chilly-mornings-to-come-after-aucklands-coldest-weekend-of-the-year/5UOZ6YRXLVGXJHYYKRHJE2XXXI/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/weather-more-chilly-mornings-to-come-after-aucklands-coldest-weekend-of-the-year/5UOZ6YRXLVGXJHYYKRHJE2XXXI/ Jamie MortonAuckland just had its coldest night in six months, with more chilly weather on the way. Photo / Alex Robertson
